Boards and Commissions
----------------------

* [Home](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/)
* [Government](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/index.php)
* Boards & Commissions

If you wish to volunteer your services as a Piscataway resident for one or more of the boards and commissions, please complete the Piscataway Township [Resident Leadership Form](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/Document_Center/Department/Administration/Mayor's%20Office/Resident%20leadership%20form.pdf?t=202512231821430) and submit the application to the Township Clerk.  
  

* [Civil Rights Advisory Commission](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/civil_rights_advisory_commission.php)
* [Community Outreach Advisory Board](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/community_outreach_advisory_board.php)
* [Cultural Arts Advisory Commission](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/cultural_arts_advisory_commission.php)
* [Ethics Board](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/ethics_board.php)
* [Health Advisory Committee](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/health_advisory_commission.php)
* [Historic Preservation Advisory Commission](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/historic_preservation_advisory_commission.php)
* [Housing and Community Development Advisory Committee](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/housing_and_community_development_committee.php)
* [Library Board of Trustees](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/library_board_of_trustees.php)
* [Planning Board](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/planning_board.php)
* [Public Relations Advisory Commission](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/public_relations_advisory_commission.php)
* [Recreation Advisory Commission](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/recreation_advisory_commission.php)
* [Rent Leveling Board](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/rent_leveling_board.php)
* [Senior Citizen Advisory Commission](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/senior_citizen_advisory_commission.php)
* [Senior Citizens Housing Board of Trustees](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/senior_citizens_housing_board_of_trustees.php)
* [Zoning Board of Adjustment](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/government/zoning_board_of_adjustment.php)

To view full membership of all the boards and commissions in Piscataway Township, please [click here](https://www.piscatawaynj.org/Document_Center/Government/Boards%20and%20Commissions/2025%20Boards%20&%20Commissions.pdf?t=202503111157080).

Thanks for signing up!
----------------------

You can unsubscribe at any time using the Unsubscribe link at the bottom of every email.

Sign up for updates!
--------------------

Get news from Piscataway Township in your e-mail inbox.
